beer.beer_description:
Hops: Mosaic, Nectaron, Nelson Sauvin.
Appearance: bright & golden.
Aroma: tropical stone fruit, resinous pine.
Flavour: citrus, hoppy with a balanced full body.
Mouthfeel: crisp citrus with full bodied resinous pine.

items.checkin_comment: First drop for the winter ski holiday, and a great one to start with

items.badge_description: Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Peaches, nutty and earthy, very easy drinking. Right up my alley.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 340 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 69!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 485 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 98!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. items.badge_description:
Hoppy IPA Day!

Did you know that, since our inception in 2010, our hoppy lil’ community has checked in over 400 million IPAs? That’s a seriously staggering amount of hops!⁠

Hoppy International Beer Day!

Beer serves as the common thread that links us worldwide, possessing the ability to bring people together in a unique way.

Beer has played a significant role in shaping countless of our most cherished memories. And if there’s one thing we’ve learned along the way, beer is best when shared with others.

Ready, set, gold! Are you ready for a Podium Party?!?

At Untappd, we love checking in beers (some say for sport), and this year, there's an easy way to earn your spot on the podium.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 105 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 22!
